title: F/S F/T T205  Charles Hanford Polar Bear back

posts.post_title: F/S F/T T205  Charles Hanford Polar Bear back
posts.post_content:
Hi folks,

Have the following card for trade or sale:



T205 Charles Hanford Polar Bear back SGC 10 large center crease $30

See scans for condition.

Prices include shipping and fair offers considered.

Looking for T205 Floyd Kroh American Beauty bacl specifically but will consider other Prewar.  Who knows, you might start a new direction for collecting for me.  Email me at [url]cubkmac32@aol.com[/url] or PM me with trade thoughts.  Paypal family and friends preferred.  See scans for comdition of cards. All of the proceeds are being given to the Furry Angel Foundation in Rancho Mirage California.

Kmac

Prices are clearly negotiable as long os the offer is reasonable.  😎

REMEMBER ALL PRCEEDs GO TO THE FURRY ANGEL FOUNDATION OF RANCHO MIRAGE CALIFORNIA.
